sentences.en: He forgot the charger for his mobile phone.
The Solar Cell Tree Charger takes a lot less upkeep than average household shrub.
sentences.cn: 太阳能电池树充电器也比普通的家庭灌木需要更少的维护。

sentences.en: The user can plug any accessory directly into the ball, like a lamp to study or a cell phone charger.
sentences.cn: 用户可以将任何配件直接插到球上，比如学习用的台灯或者手机充电器。
